introduction.description: MobileOne requires a state-of-the-art, comprehensive messaging and content delivery solution across SMS, MMS, and WAP. The platform will act as middleware, interfacing network elements during transactional flow, serving as a centralized but modular solution for business requirements across regions.
introduction.purpose: Detail the requirements of M1 regarding the Service Delivery Platform implemented by hSenid.

scope.description: Provide content delivery and charging for MobileOne customers and 3rd party Service Providers using MobileOne as mediator.
benefits: Flexible and scalable solution improving operational efficiency and service creation.
Rapid enhancement of offerings and rich content delivery to subscribers.
Delivery and charging of services by 3rd party SPs with SLA-based control and automated activation.
Reduced time-to-market and cost savings while preserving network security and integrity.
objectives: Secure Access Gateway to core network
Standards-based Web Services and middleware architecture
Centralized management of platform & applications with integration to billing, rating, and payments
Support for message mediation, routing, throughput control, logging, multi-protocol support
Provisioning systems, CDR generation & reporting, CDR Query, and dashboards

introduction.overview: This SRS is structured by SDP components and covers both Phase 1 and Phase 2 requirements.
